snippet: At least 50 people died and several remained missing after a Russian trawler sank late Wednesday near the Kamchatka Peninsula.
abstract: Russian trawler sinks in western Pacific Ocean near Kamchatka Peninsula, leaving 54 people dead and 15 missing.
lead_paragraph: At least 50 people died and several remained missing after a Russian trawler sank late Wednesday near the Kamchatka Peninsula.

headline.main: Russia: Scores Die as Trawler Sinks in the Western Pacific
headline.print_headline: Europe; Russia: 54 Killed as Trawler Sinks in the Western Pacific
